title: please beware of monster high skullector resellers
text: so I made the mistake of buying an elvira skullector doll for $80 since that‚Äôs the cheapest I could find her secondhand atm, but that should‚Äôve been a red flag- but I was too hopeful to see it. i thought I was actually going to receive it because I know people purposely price cheaper on here than other  resale sites. man was I wrong. first my package was returned to the seller due to ‚Äúaddressee not being found‚Äù even though I used my correct address that I‚Äôve used for many orders. I then asked the seller to relist because I believed it was an error on the post office‚Äôs side, but they we‚Äôre probably trying to protect me. when they relisted and shipped, what I got was not elvira, but some stupid halfway opens box with c0vid protectors!!!!! wish usps would‚Äôve resent again. now the seller is unresponsive and I can‚Äôt get my refund unless I PAY for the reshipment! It‚Äôs not my fault this seller scammed me and why should I have to pay more money for their evil. they would be charged the return label or vinted should give me one. so much for the buyer protection fee if it doesn‚Äôt protect the buyer from scams. beware the seller laikjaok5188 and don‚Äôt buy from any other my reseller if they have no reviews. also vinted please update policies on buyer protection and help side with buyers so we don‚Äôt waste our hard earned money. I won‚Äôt change my review until it‚Äôs solved.

title: High numbers of scammed attempts and awful support team
text: Today I joined this app for the first time and I tried to sell some stuff. I submitted some products and immediately one person texted me that she is interested to buy the item. Then I received an email from Vinted (or maybe somehow look like Vinted) and in the link there I got connected to the live chat and I got scammed for ‚Ç¨300! I tried to contact the support team in the app and there was no answer! I‚Äôm still trying to recall back the money from my bank since the app wasn‚Äôt helpful at all! I will never ever ever try this app ever again in my life and I suggest you to not use it unless you wanna donate money to the thieves! This app is full of scammers and there is absolutely no customer service! If there is anyway, please shut this app down as it is not legitimate at all!!!!

title: Depop or poshmark is better

The thing that made me angry was that not shipping was insanely expensive and i had to pay for the return label. Depop and poshmark both provide you with a return label for free.

title: Disappointed
text:
I enjoyed this app for about 4 months. Was easy to use and liked that they didn‚Äôt take a percentage of sales out like every other site. And shipping prices were the best I had seen which made it seem like it‚Äôd be a very popular app. Personally haven‚Äôt had any problems ordering items or selling and getting my money. 

Then out of nowhere the prices for shipping basically DOUBLED without warning or given reason. It was sneaky and not noticed at first since nothing was said about it. Makes it completely undesirable for me now as most of my items were listed at $5 or less, and every shipping option costs more than that. Small items shipping went from $3.99 to $6.92. And medium is now nearly $13, JUST TO SHIP. That doesn‚Äôt include any envelopes, boxes, tape or other packaging materials you have to buy. Nobody is going to want to buy a $3 shirt and pay nearly $7 just to receive it. Price gouging the heck out of customers AND sellers. Super disappointed in the time and effort spent listing items etc since I‚Äôll likely be switching to something else üôÅ

title: Used to be great now its not
text: vinted used to be amazing it was infact my #1 selling app until shipping prices raised... i have over 70 five star reviews and as soon as shipping went up over $6 i barley had a sale its been months now since i have sold something! it is really frustrating and and in general not as easy to use like other selling apps, the layout really needs some work! currently they are down so i just hope the repairs they make are huge so we can get a while remodeling update so sellers have an easier time selling items :( will come back later to change this review once there are improvements made till then this is what i have to say.

title: Used to be 5 stars‚Ä¶
text:
Vinted used to be my absolute favorite thrifting app. I told everyone about it. Then shipping went from .99 to 3.99 and that was challenging for both buying + selling and now at 6.92 it‚Äôs just frustrating! You can add at least $12 to every order just for shipping and fees. So a $2 item becomes almost $15.  
In addition there is little to no monitoring of spam or harassment. I can‚Äôt sell a bikini without tons of creeps messaging me and there is no liability or seller protection. 
I still love Vinted but am slowly stepping away from it as I don‚Äôt feel safe as a seller and honestly can‚Äôt even afford it anymore.

title: Shipping Price increase
text: Honestly vinted used to be one of the better apps but it seems like they‚Äôre upping the prices too. Shipping is significantly more expensive now and it discourages buyers from buying. It‚Äôs extremely hard to sell items now without having to decrease the price of the item itself.

title: Why did you change!??
text: Vinted used to be my favorite shopping app!! They always had the best prices and reasonable shipping prices but a little over a month ago they suddenly DOUBLED their shipping prices without any warning. Since then I haven‚Äôt bought anything because I think it‚Äôs ridiculous that the shipping cost is 2, sometimes 3 times the amount of the item for sale.
